name: ReasonerAgent
description: ReasonerAgent is an AI-powered assistant designed to process and respond to user queries efficiently. It leverages a language model to provide accurate and concise answers by retrieving relevant information based on the given task. The agent reads configuration files, initializes necessary components, and interacts with data flows to deliver high-quality responses.

inputs.name: task
inputs.description: The user-provided query or instruction that the agent uses to generate a response.

outputs.name: reasoner_result
outputs.description: The response generated by the ReasonerAgent based on the input task or data.
